price: Nuko babwirwe bati “Ibi ni byo mwajyaga muhinyura.”
arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
